content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm a student and I'm looking for a place that's not only affordable but also close to the city center. Your apartment seems to fit my needs. What's the lowest price you can offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's start with 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit higher than I expected. Can we negotiate? I'm willing to pay a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Fair enough, I can consider that. How about 900 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 900 Euros is more reasonable. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Is there any wiggle room on this price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I do value your appreciation. However, 900 Euros is already a considerable reduction from my initial offer. I can't go lower than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. 900 Euros is a fair price considering the location and the amenities. I'm willing to accept this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [900] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! We have a deal at 900 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
